response.original_title: 電圖 電資 國影
response.overview: The director holds the membership of the current Taiwan Film Institute, the former Chinese Taipei Film Archive and Film Library, for more than 30 years. He interviewed the former and current staffs of this institution hoping to find the meaning of his experience by talking to these old friends. But all the interviewees switched position and become the interviewers after 10 minutes. They could ask any questions to the director. By crosscutting various questions and his wondering around in his motorbike, the director went through a self-reflexive process.
response.title: Truth or dare
